meanings.definition: Pizes (verb): to award a prize or honor to someone
meanings.sent1: The teacher pizes the student for winning the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: The school pizes the top athletes at the end of the year.
meanings.sent3: The mayor pizes the best garden in town with a shiny trophy.
meanings.sent4: The company pizes the employee of the month with a special parking spot.
meanings.sent5: The community pizes acts of kindness with heartfelt thank you notes.

meanings.definition: Pizes (noun): plural form of prize, a reward or recognition for achievement
meanings.sent1: The carnival had many pizes for the games winners.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her collection of pizes on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The children's faces lit up when they saw the colorful pizes at the fair.
meanings.sent4: The treasure chest was filled with glittering pizes waiting to be claimed.
meanings.sent5: The museum showcased historical pizes from past civilizations.
